entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
